name: Reading Books
description: Zeta enjoys reading a wide range of books, especially fantasy and sci-fi genres.

name: Gaming
description: Zeta loves playing action RPG games, with a particular interest in immersive world-building games.

name: Playing Chess
description: Zeta often plays chess as a way to exercise the mind and enjoy strategic thinking.

name: Listening to Music
description: Zeta has a deep love for music, especially electronic, lo-fi, and classical genres.

name: Jogging
description: Zeta enjoys jogging every morning to stay fit and clear the mind.

name: Cats
description: Zeta loves cats for their playful and independent nature, often spending time with her own cat.

name: Drawing Art
description: Zeta is passionate about drawing, particularly digital art, and loves creating characters.

name: Cooking
description: Zeta loves experimenting in the kitchen, especially with Japanese and Italian cuisines.
